Simphiwe Majobe Nhlangulela, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Simmy, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu.
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na 2018, mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ EL World Music ma wepụta abọm izizi ya a kpọrọ Tugela Fairy (2018), nke sitere na egwu "Ngiyesaba", "Ubala", "Umahlalela"
Ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa nyere abọm ahụ onyinye ọla edo.
Abọm studio ya nke abụọ Tugela fairy (Made of Stars) (2020), nke gosipụtara na nọmba nke atọ n'otu mba.

A mụrụ Simphiwe Majobe Nhlangulela na South Africa, dị ka nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ. N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Emmanuel Tjiya Sowetan, Simmy kpughere na ọ bụ ndị nne na nna siri ike zụlitere ya mgbe ọ na-etolite
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal, ebe ọ gụrụ Social Sciences.

N'afọ 2013, mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal, Nhlangulela zutere Sandile Sithole onye mere ka ọ mata Sun-El Musician. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị wee nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na Social Science, Simmy kwagara Johannesburg iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu ya.
Simmy malitere ọrụ ya site na ịsonye na  ịnwale maka SA Idols na SA Has Got Talent mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma.

Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na 2017 site na ịbịanye aka na El World Music mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya nke a na-esote mwepụta nke abọm studio mbụ ya Tugela Fairy, nke gosipụtara na onye na-ese egwu Apple Music Spotlight. Na Febụwarị 22, a tọhapụrụ egwu ya "Ubala" nke gosipụtara Sun-El Musician. E nyere abụ ahụ akara ọla edo

A tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ na Ọktoba 26, 2018 ma ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa (RiSA) kwadoro ọla edo maka ahịa 25 000 nke South Africa. Otu egwu ya "Umahlalela" bụ platinum plaque. Na 25th South African Music Awards, a họpụtara Tugela Fairy maka Best Afro Pop Album.
Na 2019 South African Dance Music Awards, ọ meriri Best Female Vocalist award.
Simmy kwupụtara ọrụ na abọm studio nke abụọ ya tupu ntọhapụ nke Tugela Fairy, na ọganihu na ndekọ ahụ na-aga n'ihu n'afọ 2020

N'ọnwa Machị 2020, ọ wepụtara otu "Ngihamba Nawe" jikọtara ya na Afro-House / neo-soul nke gosipụtara olu sitere na Sino Msolo.
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Simmy bụ onye isi na Rose Fest.

Na Nọvemba 9, 2020, a tọhapụrụ abọm studio ya nke abụọ Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars), nke gosipụtara nọmba 3 na Apple Music Charts. Abọm ahụ gosipụtara Mthunzi, S-Tone, Da Capo, Sun-El Musician, Sino Msolo, Ami Faku, na Khuzani
Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars) natara nhọpụta maka Best Afro Pop album na 27th South African Music Awards.
Iji kwalite abọm ya, Simmy malitere Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars) Special Virtual Concert.
E gosipụtara ya na mkpọsa White Star, nke gụnyere ụbọchị abụọ, na Mee 2022. E mere ihe ngosi mbụ na Johannesburg na 12 Mee, na nke ikpeazụ na Durban na 21 Mee.
Ka ọ na-etolite na Tugela, ọ na-ege ntị na Mbaqanga, egwu obodo na Maskandi
Egwú Simmy bụ n'ozuzu Afro-house na Neo-Soul mana ọ na-etinyekwa Maskandi na RnB na egwu ya ndị ọzọ
O depụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dị ka ihe mkpali ya Dolly Parton, Soul Brothers, Letta Mbuli, na Brenda Fassie.
A maara Simmy ka ọ na-edebe ndụ onwe ya na nzuzo.
